title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: The Executive Committee oversees all key aspects of the strategy, performance and financial soundness of the Bank. Our senior leadership group covers every aspect of the EBRD's business and advises the Executive Committee and President.

title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: Learn about the EBRD's journey to investing more than €210 billion in over 7,500 projects · Through projects, business services and involvement in high-level policy reform, we're doing more than ever before

title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Divided between its headquarters ... of a three-tier structure composed of firstly, the president and the staff, secondly the Board of Governors and finally the Board of Directors....

title: Who we are
snippet: Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors, which has overall authority over the Bank. Our President is Odile Renaud-Basso (left). The President manages our work under the guidance of the Board of Directors.
